items.title: Intel says Arc GPUs will live on after Nvidia deal
items.raw_excerpt: In the future, Intel will make CPUs with Nvidia graphics inside — among other things, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang confirmed today that Nvidia will contribute “GPU chiplets” that Intel can place alongside its x86 CPU cores instead of the Arc integrated graphics it develops in-house today. But, at least for now, Intel says that doesn’t […]

title_i18n.en: Intel says Arc GPUs will live on after Nvidia deal
title_i18n.zh: 英特尔表示与英伟达达成协议后Arc显卡仍将继续存在。
title_i18n.es: Intel afirma que las GPU Arc continuarán existiendo tras el acuerdo con Nvidia

excerpt_i18n.en: In the future, Intel will make CPUs with Nvidia graphics inside — among other things, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang confirmed today that Nvidia will contribute “GPU chiplets” that Intel can place alongside its x86 CPU cores instead of the Arc integrated graphics it develops in-house today. But, at least for now, Intel says that doesn’t […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 未来，英特尔将在CPU中集成英伟达显卡——英伟达CEO黄仁勋今日确认，除其他合作外，英伟达将提供"GPU小芯片"，供英特尔将其与x86 CPU核心封装在同一处理器中。
excerpt_i18n.es: En el futuro, Intel fabricará CPUs con gráficos de Nvidia en su interior — entre otras cosas, el CEO de Nvidia, Jensen Huang, confirmó hoy que Nvidia contribuirá con "chiplets de GPU" que Intel podrá colocar junto a sus núcleos de CPU x86.

items.title: Show HN: Illustria – AI illustration generator with free downloadable gallery
items.raw_excerpt:
Hi HN I built Illustria – a simple tool to generate custom illustrations on demand Why I built it:
- I was frustrated spending hours browsing stock sites for the right visuals.
- Free illustrations often didn’t match the style I needed.
- I wanted a faster way to get usable illustrations for landing pages, pitch decks, and side projects. What it does today:
- Generate illustrations instantly based on your input (first generation is free).
- Explore different looks/styles without needing design skills.
- Download and use them right away.
- Browse a free gallery of ready-made illustrations: https://arcanvia.com/illustria/gallery I’d love feedback on:
- Would you actually use this for your side projects?
- What features would make it more valuable for you?

title_i18n.en: Show HN: Illustria – AI illustration generator with free downloadable gallery
title_i18n.zh: 展示HN：Illustria – 带免费可下载图库的AI插画生成器
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: Illustria – Generador de ilustraciones con IA con galería descargable gratuita

excerpt_i18n.en:
Hi HN I built Illustria – a simple tool to generate custom illustrations on demand Why I built it:
- I was frustrated spending hours browsing stock sites for the right visuals.
- Free illustrations often didn’t match the style I needed.
- I wanted a faster way to get usable illustrations for landing pages, pitch decks, and side projects. What it does today:
- Generate illustrations instantly based on your input (first generation is free).
- Explore different looks/styles without needing design skills.
- Download and use them right away.
- Browse a free gallery of ready-made illustrations: https://arcanvia.com/illustria/gallery I’d love feedback on:
- Would you actually use this for your side projects?
- What features would make it more valuable for you?
excerpt_i18n.zh:
大家好，我开发了Illustria——一个能按需生成定制插画的简易工具。开发原因：
- 厌倦了花数小时在素材网站搜寻合适视觉素材
- 免费插画往往与需求不匹配
excerpt_i18n.es:
Hola HN, he creado Illustria: una herramienta sencilla para generar ilustraciones personalizadas bajo demanda. Por qué la creé:
- Me frustraba pasar horas navegando por sitios de bancos de imágenes buscando los recursos visuales adecuados.
- Las ilustraciones gratuitas a menudo no coincidían con el

items.title: Show HN: dumpall — Dump project code into AI-ready Markdown
items.raw_excerpt: dumpall: The smart file aggregator for AI context and code reviews I've built a new CLI utility called dumpall that solves a pain point I've often had: needing to quickly provide a structured dump of project files to an AI for context, or to a colleague for a code review. The core idea is to follow the Unix philosophy: do one thing well. dumpall recursively reads files in a directory, respects exclusions (like node_modules or .git), and formats the output into clean Markdown fenced code blocks. Key Features: LLM-Optimized: Output is designed for easy consumption by large language models, providing clean and structured context. Clipboard Integration: Use the --clip flag to send the entire output directly to your clipboard. Smart Exclusions: Easily ignore unwanted directories and files. Vers

title_i18n.en: Show HN: dumpall — Dump project code into AI-ready Markdown
title_i18n.zh: 展示 HN：dumpall —— 将项目代码转储为 AI 就绪的 Markdown 格式
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: dumpall — Volcar código de proyecto a Markdown listo para IA

The core idea is to follow the Unix philosophy: do one thing well. dumpall recursively reads files in a directory, respects exclusions (like node_modules or .git), and formats the output into clean Markdown fenced code blocks. Key Features: LLM-Optimized: Output is designed for easy consumption by large language models, providing clean and structured context. Clipboard Integration: Use the --clip flag to send the entire output directly to your clipboard. Smart Exclusions: Easily ignore unwanted directories and files. Vers
excerpt_i18n.zh: dumpall：专为AI上下文和代码审查打造的智能文件聚合工具。我开发了一款名为dumpall的新CLI实用程序，它解决了我长期面临的痛点：需要快速为AI提供项目文件的结构化转储。

items.title: Nvidia and Intel’s $5 billion deal is apparently about eating AMD’s lunch
items.raw_excerpt: Today, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang and Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan held a joint webcast to explain just why the world's most valuable company (Nvidia's at $4.28 trillion) is throwing a $5 billion lifeline to a struggling competitor. Nvidia quickly shut down several possible explanations. Huang claimed it had nothing to do with Trump, who famously […]

title_i18n.en: Nvidia and Intel’s $5 billion deal is apparently about eating AMD’s lunch
title_i18n.zh: 英伟达与英特尔50亿美元的交易显然意在抢占AMD的市场份额。
title_i18n.es: El acuerdo de 5.000 millones de dólares entre Nvidia e Intel aparentemente trata de arrebatarle el negocio a AMD.

excerpt_i18n.en: Today, Nvidia CEO Jensen Huang and Intel CEO Lip-Bu Tan held a joint webcast to explain just why the world's most valuable company (Nvidia's at $4.28 trillion) is throwing a $5 billion lifeline to a struggling competitor. Nvidia quickly shut down several possible explanations. Huang claimed it had nothing to do with Trump, who famously […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 今天，英伟达首席执行官黄仁勋与英特尔首席执行官陈立武联合举行网络直播，阐释这家全球市值最高的公司（英伟达市值4.28万亿美元）为何向陷入困境的竞争对手提供50亿美元纾困资金。
excerpt_i18n.es: Hoy, el consejero delegado de Nvidia, Jensen Huang, y el consejero delegado de Intel, Lip-Bu Tan, realizaron una retransmisión web conjunta para explicar por qué la empresa más valiosa del mundo (Nvidia, con 4,28 billones de dólares) está lanzando un salvavidas de 5000 millones de dólares a un competidor en dificultades.

items.title: Show HN: Nanobot – Turn MCP servers into full AI agents
items.raw_excerpt: Today we're releasing Nanobot an open-source framework for building AI agents on top of the Model Context Protocol (MCP). MCP servers are a great way to expose structured tools, but they’re usually just that—collections of functions. Nanobot makes it simple to wrap any MCP server with reasoning, a system prompt, and orchestration so it behaves like a real agent. Even better, Nanobot fully supports MCP-UI, so agents can pass rich interactive components (forms, dashboards, even mini-apps) directly into chat. A simple example: if you had a Blackjack MCP server with tools like deal, bet, and hit, you could wrap it with Nanobot to create a dealer agent that knows how to explain the game, guide a player, and render an interactive Blackjack table inside chat. We built this because we wanted agent

title_i18n.en: Show HN: Nanobot – Turn MCP servers into full AI agents
title_i18n.zh: 展示 HN：纳米机器人——将 MCP 服务器转变为完整 AI 代理
title_i18n.es: Mostrar HN: Nanobot – Convierte servidores MCP en agentes de IA completos

excerpt_i18n.en: Today we're releasing Nanobot an open-source framework for building AI agents on top of the Model Context Protocol (MCP). MCP servers are a great way to expose structured tools, but they’re usually just that—collections of functions. Nanobot makes it simple to wrap any MCP server with reasoning, a system prompt, and orchestration so it behaves like a real agent. Even better, Nanobot fully supports MCP-UI, so agents can pass rich interactive components (forms, dashboards, even mini-apps) directly into chat. A simple example: if you had a Blackjack MCP server with tools like deal, bet, and hit, you could wrap it with Nanobot to create a dealer agent that knows how to explain the game, guide a player, and render an interactive Blackjack table inside chat. We built this because we wanted agent
excerpt_i18n.zh: 今天我们发布Nanobot，这是一个基于模型上下文协议（MCP）构建AI代理的开源框架。MCP服务器是暴露结构化工具的绝佳方式，但它们通常仅止于此——即工具集合。
excerpt_i18n.es: Hoy lanzamos Nanobot, un framework de código abierto para construir agentes de IA sobre el Protocolo de Contexto de Modelo (MCP). Los servidores MCP son una excelente manera de exponer herramientas estructuradas, pero normalmente son solo eso: colecciones

items.title: Jensen Huang Wants You to Know He’s Getting a Lot Out of the ‘Fantastic’ Nvidia-Intel Deal
items.raw_excerpt: Nvidia is investing $5 billion in Intel. The news comes after the US government took a roughly 10 percent equity stake in the struggling chipmaker.

title_i18n.en: Jensen Huang Wants You to Know He’s Getting a Lot Out of the ‘Fantastic’ Nvidia-Intel Deal
title_i18n.zh: 黄仁勋希望你知道他从“绝佳”的英伟达-英特尔交易中获益良多。
title_i18n.es: Jensen Huang quiere que sepas que está sacando mucho partido del "fantástico" acuerdo entre Nvidia e Intel.

excerpt_i18n.en: Nvidia is investing $5 billion in Intel. The news comes after the US government took a roughly 10 percent equity stake in the struggling chipmaker.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 英伟达向英特尔投资50亿美元。此前美国政府已收购这家陷入困境的芯片制造商约10%的股份。
excerpt_i18n.es: Nvidia está invirtiendo 5000 millones de dólares en Intel. La noticia llega después de que el gobierno de Estados Unidos adquiriera aproximadamente un 10 por ciento de participación accionarial en el fabricante de chips en dificultades.

items.title: Research: AI and Software Verification/Validation
items.raw_excerpt: I’m Guilherme Bolfe, and I recently started my Master’s in Software Engineering. I’m conducting a research study to understand how Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Language Models (LLMs) are being used to support software Verification and Validation (V&V) activities — both in industry and in academic proof-of-concepts. * If you work in software development, testing, quality assurance, or related fields, your experience could greatly help us map: * Tools already in use * Perceived benefits (productivity, quality, time savings, etc.) * Challenges and limitations encountered * How you see the future of AI in V&V The survey is quick (5–10 min), completely anonymous, and your answers are confidential: [Take the survey] https://forms.gle/XCxpzt6Par4XHR37A I really appreciate your time an

title_i18n.en: Research: AI and Software Verification/Validation
title_i18n.zh: 研究：人工智能与软件验证/确认
title_i18n.es: Investigación: IA y Verificación/Validación de Software

I’m conducting a research study to understand how Artificial Intelligence (AI) and Language Models (LLMs) are being used to support software Verification and Validation (V&V) activities — both in industry and in academic proof-of-concepts. * If you work in software development, testing, quality assurance, or related fields, your experience could greatly help us map: * Tools already in use * Perceived benefits (productivity, quality, time savings, etc.) * Challenges and limitations encountered * How you see the future of AI in V&V The survey is quick (5–10 min), completely anonymous, and your answers are confidential: [Take the survey] https://forms.gle/XCxpzt6Par4XHR37A I really appreciate your time an

excerpt_i18n.es: Soy Guilherme Bolfe y recientemente he comenzado mi máster en Ingeniería del Software. Estoy realizando un estudio de investigación para comprender cómo la Inteligencia Artificial (IA) y los Modelos de Lenguaje (LLM) se están utilizando para apoyar el desarrol

items.raw_excerpt: At its Connect keynote on Wednesday, Meta officially introduced the $799.99 Meta Ray-Ban Display, also known as Hypernova. The brand's new, high-end smart glasses feature an in-lens display you can control with wrist-based gestures via the new Meta Neural Band that's included. The display pairs with your phone and allows you to see everything from […]

title_i18n.zh: Meta的雷朋第二代和奥克利先锋眼镜现已开放预订。
title_i18n.es: Las gafas Ray-Ban Gen 2 y Oakley Vanguard de Meta están disponibles para reserva anticipada.

excerpt_i18n.en: At its Connect keynote on Wednesday, Meta officially introduced the $799.99 Meta Ray-Ban Display, also known as Hypernova. The brand's new, high-end smart glasses feature an in-lens display you can control with wrist-based gestures via the new Meta Neural Band that's included. The display pairs with your phone and allows you to see everything from […]
excerpt_i18n.zh: 在周三的Connect主题演讲中，Meta正式推出了售价799.99美元的Meta Ray-Ban Display智能眼镜，又名Hypernova。这款高端新品采用镜片内置显示屏技术，可通过腕部动作进行操控。
excerpt_i18n.es: En su presentación principal de Connect del miércoles, Meta presentó oficialmente las Meta Ray-Ban Display de 799,99 dólares, también conocidas como Hypernova. Las nuevas gafas inteligentes de gama alta de la marca cuentan con una pantalla en la lente que puedes controlar con gestos de muñeca.

items.title: New attack on ChatGPT research agent pilfers secrets from Gmail inboxes
items.raw_excerpt: Unlike most prompt injections, ShadowLeak executes on OpenAI's cloud-based infrastructure.

title_i18n.en: New attack on ChatGPT research agent pilfers secrets from Gmail inboxes
title_i18n.zh: 新型ChatGPT研究代理攻击窃取Gmail收件箱机密。
title_i18n.es: Nuevo ataque al agente de investigación de ChatGPT roba secretos de los buzones de Gmail.

excerpt_i18n.en: Unlike most prompt injections, ShadowLeak executes on OpenAI's cloud-based infrastructure.
excerpt_i18n.zh: 与大多数提示注入不同，ShadowLeak在OpenAI的云端基础设施上执行。
excerpt_i18n.es: A diferencia de la mayoría de las inyecciones de comandos, ShadowLeak se ejecuta en la infraestructura basada en la nube de OpenAI.
